# [Interview #977: Cosmere Q&A - 17th Shard, Entry #186](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=977#186)

#### Cheese Ninja

Did Amaram ever find out who the Shardbearer that Kaladin killed was?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes.
